ing: 2 (6.5 ounce) jars marinated artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
1 (4 ounce) can diced green chile peppers, drained
des: "A warm dip with Parmesan cheese, artichoke hearts and spicy green chile peppers. It's great when garnished with chopped green onions and tomatoes. Serve it with tortilla chips or pita slices. Omit the green chiles, if desired. Delicious cold, too!"
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
In a medium bowl, mix together the artichoke hearts, mayonnaise, Parmesan cheese and chile peppers. Transfer the mixture to a 9x9 inch baking dish.
Bake in the preheated oven 20 to 25 minutes, or until lightly browned.
